--mbx-checkbox-background-light.description: CheckBox background when dark mode is off

--mbx-checkbox-background-dark.description: CheckBox background when dark mode is on

--mbx-checkbox-background-hover-light.description: CheckBox background when dark mode is off, on hover

--mbx-checkbox-background-hover-dark.description: CheckBox background when dark mode is on, on hover

--mbx-checkbox-tick-color-light.description: CheckBox tick color when dark mode is off

--mbx-checkbox-tick-color-dark.description: CheckBox tick color when dark mode is on
